body.div:
WSO2 Mashup Server Community
WSO2 Mashup Sharing Community Portal (Mooshup.com)
mooshup.com supports the sharing and hosting of mashups developed using WSO2 Mashup Server. Mashup developers can upload their mashups to mooshup.com with the click of a button from theWSO2 Mashup Server web console. This will enable the mashup developers around the world to try your mashup. You can try theirs online as well or download them to your own mashup server.
You may also subscribe to feeds on mooshup.com to be notified of comments and other activity on your or other people's mashups.
WSO2 Mashup Server Resources
Articles, Tutorials, Webbinars
You could access various resources related to the Mashup Server on the Library page on the WSO2 Oxygen Tank.
You can contribute to the WSO2 Mashup Server by joining our mailing lists, forums, and also by reporting issues.
Mailing Lists
Join our mailing list and correspond with the developers directly.
Developer List : mashup-dev@wso2.org | Subscribe | Unsubscribe | Mail Archive
User List : mashup-user@wso2.org | Subscribe | Unsubscribe | Mail Archive
Reporting Issues
WSO2 encourages you to report issues and your wishes for WSO2 Mashup Server using the publicJIRA.
You can also watch how they are resolved, and comment on the progress.
Discussion Forums
Alternatively, questions can be raised using the forum available.
Community Forum : Community forum for WSO2 Mashup Server
Source Code Repository
SVN : http://www.wso2.org/repos/wso2/trunk/mashup/
Fisheye :
http://www.wso2.org/fisheye/viewrep/svn/trunk/mashup
